title: Multi-Criteria Flight Search
steps: Enter multiple search criteria such as flight number and airport code.
Initiate a search using these criteria.
expected_result: Search results accurately reflect all specified criteria.

title: Filtering by Departure Time
steps: Enter a specific departure time range for a search.
Apply the departure time filter and execute the search.
expected_result: Results show flights with departure times within the specified range.

title: Filtering by Aircraft Type
steps: Select a specific aircraft type for filtering.
Apply the filter and perform a flight search.
expected_result: Results display flights using the selected aircraft type.
